definition: structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)

sentences.english: It is not clear how many survived the collapse of the three-storey building.
sentences.chinese: 倒塌的三層樓下還有多少倖存者目前還不得而知。

sentences.english: I do not know. Perhaps the answer lies in the star that lit their path.
sentences.chinese: 我不得而知，只能留待引領智者的那星星自己回答。

sentences.english: Though he surfaced from time to time in the years after, Dengar's current whereabouts and activities are unknown.
sentences.chinese: 登加後來時隱時現，他目前的處境和活動不得而知。

sentences.english: The long-term recurrence rate is not yet known.
sentences.chinese: 術後疝氣的長期複發率尚不得而知。

sentences.english: Whether this is so may never be known.
sentences.chinese: 是否確實如此現在還不得而知。

sentences.english: It is unclear what caused the Sunda clouded leopard to evolve into two forms.
sentences.chinese: 是什麼導致了巽他雲豹進化上的分野還不得而知。

sentences.english: It is unclear if Karzai has the power to order an end to such strikes.
sentences.chinese: 卡爾扎伊是有權力命令停止這樣的空襲還不得而知。

sentences.english: And still the cause of the phocomelia outbreak remained unknown .
sentences.chinese: 然而，畸形兒病例大量發生的原因不得而知。

sentences.english: Anschutz's deal may come out in the financial wash.
sentences.chinese: 安舒茲的交易在財務上能否圓滿解決還不得而知。

sentences.english: It was unclear how Tam's real identity was discovered.
sentences.chinese: 目前，Tam的真實身份是如何被發現的還不得而知。

sentences.english: The precise mechanisms by which BPA might be affecting sexual function and semen quality are not yet well understood.
sentences.chinese: 雙酚A是如何影響性功能和精子質量這點還不得而知。

sentences.english: It's unclear how much good the hair booms may do.
sentences.chinese: 毛髮水柵的功效如何我們不得而知。

sentences.english: Whether capable of good I know not.
sentences.chinese: 至於能否爲善，我可就不得而知了。

sentences.english: It is not known whether he has been evaluated by a neurologist recently.
sentences.chinese: 關於他最近是否接受神經科醫生的檢查，尚不得而知。

sentences.english: Precisely why some Chinese words are so freighted with emotion is anyone’s guess.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼一些中國詞語寓意於情感不得而知。

sentences.english: If there is the possibility of bringing somebody in we'll cross that bridge when we come to it.
sentences.chinese: 引援的可能性現在還不得而知，不過船到橋頭自然直。

definition: as for/as to/to go so far as to
to go to the bottom of a matter/after all/when all is said and done/(in an interrogative sentence) finally/outcome/result
not to have access/beyond one's authority or capability/sth one has no way of doing
finally/in the end/when all is said and done/after all/to the end/to the last
returning to our main topic,.../that said,.../again,.../in this connection/in passing/nevertheless,.../anyhow
